.git
.github

.DS_Store
.svn

*.bak

# WordPress specific files
wp-config.php

# WP Engine specific files and directories

.gitattributes
.wpe-devkit/
.wpengine-conf/
_wpeprivate

/uploads/
/blogs.dir/
/upgrade/*
/backup-db/*
/advanced-cache.php
/wp-cache-config.php
/cache/*
/cache/supercache/*
/object-cache.php
/drop-ins/

/mysql.sql

/mu-plugins/slt-force-strong-passwords.php

/mu-plugins/stop-long-comments.php
